slaPrinters.altText: Professional SLA 3D printers for high-precision printing

fdmPrinters.altText: Professional FDM 3D printers for rapid prototyping

slaPrintDetail.altText: Detailed view of SLA 3D printed component

manufacturing.title: Know your manufacturing needs, like you know your business.
manufacturing.description: From rapid prototyping to end-use parts, our advanced 3D printing solutions deliver precision-engineered results that adapt to your specific requirements. We combine cutting-edge technology with deep expertise to transform your ideas into reality, ensuring each project meets the highest standards of quality and accuracy.

fdm.title: Transform Your Vision Into Reality
fdm.description: Our advanced FDM technology brings industrial-grade precision to your desktop. With multi-material capabilities and a wide range of engineering-grade filaments, we enable you to create functional prototypes and end-use parts that meet the highest standards.

features.multiMaterial: Multi-material printing with up to 5 materials
features.advancedFeatures: Advanced features like soluble supports and composite materials

sla.title: See the Invisible, Print the Impossible
sla.description: Experience microscopic precision with our SLA technology. At 25 microns, we achieve details smaller than a human hair, bringing unprecedented accuracy to your projects. From intricate jewelry to precise engineering components, witness the future of manufacturing.

features.layerHeight: 25 micron layer height (1/3 the width of a human hair)
features.surfaceFinish: Ultra-smooth surface finish that feels like injection molded
features.applications: Perfect for jewelry, dental work, and miniatures

features.precision: High-precision printing with exceptional detail and accuracy
features.materials: Wide range of materials for various applications
features.applications: Suitable for prototyping, production, and custom parts

fdm.title: Transform Your Vision Into Reality
fdm.description: Our advanced FDM technology brings industrial-grade precision to your desktop. With multi-material capabilities and a wide range of engineering-grade filaments, we enable you to create functional prototypes and end-use parts that meet the highest standards.

features.multiMaterial: Multi-material printing with up to 5 materials
features.advancedFeatures: Advanced features like soluble supports and composite materials

materials.title: 3D Printing Materials
materials.subtitle: Explore our wide range of high-quality materials for both FDM and SLA printing technologies.

prusament.description: Biodegradable thermoplastic with excellent print quality and ease of use.

filamentum.description: Premium quality PLA filament known for its exceptional quality and unique color palette. Made in Czech Republic with precise diameter tolerance.

raise3d.description: Professional-grade materials optimized for the Raise3D Pro3 series. Superior quality and consistency for industrial applications.

prusament.description: High-quality SLA resins from Prusa Research offering exceptional detail, various properties, and multiple color options. Including standard model resins, flexible variants, and eco-friendly bio-based options.

phrozen.description: Professional-grade SLA resins from Phrozen, optimized for high-resolution 3D printing. Features specialized formulations for jewelry casting and water-washable options.

formlabs.description: Professional-grade engineering resins from Formlabs, offering unmatched quality and precision. Industry-leading materials for demanding applications.

prusa.title: Prusa i3 MK3S+
prusa.subtitle: Professional FDM
prusa.description: Reliable workhorse for rapid prototyping and functional parts with wide material compatibility.

prusaMMU.title: Prusa i3 MK3S+ MMU2S
prusaMMU.subtitle: Multi-Material
prusaMMU.description: Multi-material printing capabilities with up to 5 different materials in a single print.

skrinter.title: Skrinter
skrinter.subtitle: Large Format
skrinter.description: Large build volume printer for bigger projects and production runs.

raise3d.title: Raise3D Pro3
raise3d.subtitle: Industrial Grade
raise3d.description: Industrial-grade FDM printer for professional production and engineering applications.

form3.title: Formlabs Form 3+
form3.subtitle: Professional SLA
form3.description: Advanced Low Force Stereolithography (LFS) technology for exceptional detail and surface finish.

phrozenMini.title: Phrozen Sonic Mini 8K
phrozenMini.subtitle: High Resolution
phrozenMini.description: Ultra-high 8K resolution for incredibly detailed prints with 22µm XY precision.

phrozenMega.title: PHROZEN Sonic MEGA 8K MSLA
phrozenMega.subtitle: Large Format
phrozenMega.description: Large build volume with 4K resolution for bigger projects without compromising quality.

prusa.title: Prusa SL1S
prusa.subtitle: Speed & Precision
prusa.description: Fast MSLA technology with 5.5" mono LCD and integrated post-processing solution.

manufacturing.title: Know your manufacturing needs, like you know your business.

We combine cutting-edge technology with deep expertise to transform your ideas into reality, ensuring each project meets the highest standards of quality and accuracy.

behindTheScenes.title: Behind the Scenes
behindTheScenes.description: Follow our journey and discover how we bring your ideas to life through cutting-edge 3D printing technology.

course.title: Transform Your Ideas Into Reality
course.description: Join our comprehensive 3D printing course and learn from industry experts. From basics to advanced techniques, we'll guide you through every step of the journey.

handsOn.title: Hands-on Experience
handsOn.description: Work with professional-grade equipment and learn through practical projects

expert.title: Expert Instruction
expert.description: Learn from certified professionals with years of industry experience

certification.title: Certification
